Author: grossenten98
Text: Lol, I once gained like 17lbs in a week. But that’s All went away by now.  But damn, jobs, school, whatever, it all bothers the crap out of me

Author: grossenten98
Text: Since I was disqualified from joining the army 2 weeks ago, I’ve been on the verge of relapse.  I know that that must feel awful and it is really awful to be rejected like that.  It’s been a long while since I’ve binged so I’m not sure what you should do.  One thing that helped me was just abruptly telling myself to Stop. Also, talking about Normal stuff with a friend helped also
